response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed with this offer, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
